mapper.select: SELECT users.id, users.email, users.avf, users.name, users.password, users.locked, users.expired, user_roles.role, codemst.code_nm FROM users INNER JOIN ( SELECT users.id, @RN := @RN + 1 AS RN FROM users, (SELECT @RN := 0) RC WHERE users.email = #{email} AND users.avf <= CURDATE() ORDER BY avf DESC ) RC ON users.id = RC.id INNER JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.user_id = users.id INNER JOIN codemst ON codemst.code_id = 1 AND codemst.code = user_roles.role WHERE users.email = #{email} AND RC.RN = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, avf, name, password, locked, expired) VALUES (#{email}, CURDATE(), #{username}, #{password}, false, false)
INSERT INTO user_roles (user_id, role, delflg) VALUES (#{id}, '01', '0')
